settings_tab.modify_community_handle_lab.string: Add or change your organization’s public profile handle

settings_tab.delete_community_descriptio.string: Delete your organization's public profile, including all published files, plugins, likes, and follow data

settings_tab.community_commenters_descri.string: Manage Community members who have been restricted from commenting on your organization’s resources

settings_tab.team_creation_description.string: Change who can create teams in this organization

settings_tab.add_domain_label.string: Add a domain to your organization

settings_tab.domain_management_descripti.string: Control which domains are associated with your organization.

settings_tab.guest_membership_descriptio.string: Control how external users can join your organization as guests.

settings_tab.external_collaboration_cont.string: Choose how members access files, projects, and teams from outside {orgName}

settings_tab.domain_capture_contact_supp.string: Domain capture must be enabled to update this setting. To get started, email admin-support@figma.com.

settings_tab.public_sharing_description.string: Allow members to share links outside of your organization

settings_tab.password_controls_settings_.string: Choose what type of passwords can be added to files

settings_tab.network_access_restriction_.string: Restrict personal access on this network

settings_tab.authentication_description.string: Change how users log in and authenticate to Figma

settings_tab.saml_description.string: Enable and configure SAML SSO for your organization

settings_tab.scim_group_description.string: Manage licenses and assign billing group and workspace membership with your IDP

settings_tab.scim_description.string: Enable and configure SCIM for your organization

settings_tab.idle_session_timeout_descri.string: Choose when to automatically log out inactive accounts
